short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear all unwanted popups (invasive and overlay ads, banners) just in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will recognize any unwanted popups (invasive and overlay ads, banners) and will clear them just in one click.

Main features:
Skip a website if you don't want any popups to be cleared.
You can remove any element on a page using the manual mode. 
It can be turned on by clicking the right-click context menu action. To exit from the manual mode, simply click the ESC button. 

*Refreshing the page will restore the complete content as originally intended.

Enjoy!
